entry.title: Happy Rubik
entry.content:
Origin 起因

I’ve always wanted to write a simple 3D game since I was very young. And when I was a Junior, I learned a little about OpenGL and Android, and I was also a fan of Rubik cubes. At the moment, I said to myself, why not combine those three things into an App? That was when the project started, and I coded, on and off, for about 2 years. Now it is a pretty decent one with about 10000 lines of code. I think, currently it is something I can brag about. I’ll just put a brief introduction here and you can view the code on Github.

Intruduction 简介

Happy Rubik is an app of Rubik’s Cube on Android, which implements almost everything about Rubik’s Cube.

欢乐魔方是一款安卓上的魔方应用。它几乎完美支持三阶魔方的各种操作。

  • 单指旋转一列魔方进行单列旋转；

  • 双指旋转两列魔方进行双列旋转；

  • 双指旋转一列魔方进行180°旋转；

  • 在经典模式下摇一摇可以打乱或还原；

  • 在计时模式和对战模式下可以保存录像；
